text:
On the western tip of Isla Holbox
in the Yucatan Peninsula there's a beach
called Punta Cocos.

It's easy to get you
by bike and it's one of the most popular sunset spots on the island
At night it holds a secret... Bioluminescence.
These lights are caused by plankton.

Creatures so small you can't even
see them

Three can fit onto the tip of a needle,
and they can cause a chemical reaction
inside themselves that produces light

This light is used to scare away other
animals trying to eat them.

- Is it on your arms?
- Amazing, So cool.

- Look! 
- Can you touch it?
It's on your thumb.
This is a horse shoe crab. They've been basically the same since dinosaurs.

They are incredible animals.
Sorry, I'll flip you back over.
The cockroaches of the sea?
The man and the woman
During this time of year many of the plankton dig into the sand,
but if you rub your feet...
You can still see them
There aren't many places on this planet you can see bioluminescent plankton in this quantity,

but one of these places is Isla
Holbox in Mexico.
Alright! How did you like the video about Holbox?

People told Mariannela and I to go check out this
beautiful slice of sand of the northern

part of the Yucatan Peninsula because it
was paradise,

so we went up to Holbox and I also heard about
bioluminescence, and for myself...

bioluminescence is one of the coolest
things on the planet, and it never gets old,

but it was May and I heard the best
time it was see the glowing plankton was

in July / August so we went to the
beautiful spot in the beginning

Punta Cocos with hammocks. So cool.
Hung out until late night which is the

same place you see the bioluminescence  and
we did see a little bit so I made a video about it.

but we're excited to go
back in July / August to see the real show

if you're in and around Yucatan
Peninsula, Cancun or Playa del Carmen

head north to Holbox. It is beautiful and
it's just on the verge of being discovered.

Experiences over Possessions
- Take care of the beaches!
Kick the Grind

Kick the Grind.
Peace Guys.
